context.description: ğŸ“ Explain how context is built
context.title: ğŸ“ **Context Management**
context.explanation:
**How Context Works:**

ğŸ”¹ **Conversation Memory:** I remember our entire conversation within a session.

ğŸ”¹ **Message Context:** Each message includes:
  â€¢ Your message text
  â€¢ Previous conversation history
  â€¢ Current settings and preferences
  â€¢ Available tools and capabilities

ğŸ”¹ **Context Window:** Limited by model capacity (typically 128k-200k tokens).

ğŸ”¹ **Compaction:** Old messages are archived when context is full.

**ğŸ’¡ Tips:**
â€¢ Use `/new` to start fresh
â€¢ Use `/compact` to optimize context
â€¢ Important info is preserved across sessions
